title: 14 day ban for 1 single game.
body: I am so fed up with this bullshit, have not played the game for 5 - 6 months, started a week ago and during that week i did not show any toxic behavior towards anyone, today i had a bad day in general, come home to play some league and knowing my luck i get two people who are not communicating and intentionally feeding, all i did was say three words, three bad words %%% x2 and dick once, that's all it took. Now i am here sitting and thinking how can that happen ? i mean do i not get a warning first after not playing the game for 6 months ? surely during that time i could not have been toxic since i did not queue up for any games ? Under the ban policy it says player can be banned for a number of reasons, feeding and not contributing being one of them, but i can guarantee that those two guys a played my last game with are just fine, how is this fare ? My account has been suspended by a fucking algorithm, the so called "Instant feedback system" or whatever. Those two trolls in my game deserved what i said, they wore wasting my time, and the time of two other players on our team, not to mention the elo, etc. I can assure you that most people who are in their right state of mind and like competitiveness would have said something. Anyway, this is a joke, instead of actually having the decency to investigate the matter properly, i get banned, ignoring my side of things and getting straight to the solution, AND with no possibility of an un-ban even if you do explain yourself.
